crud.jsonrpc: SELECT CARD_NO "cardno",ID_VALUE "idvalue",ID_TYPE "idtype",ACTION_FLAG "actionflag",VALID_CARD "validcard",ALREADY_REGISTERED "alreadyregistered",REGISTRATION_COMPLETED "registrationcompleted",INPUT_FILE_NAME "inputfilename",RETURN_FILE_CREATED "returnfilecreated",ERROR_CODE "errorcode",FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG "fileprocessedflag",NATIONALITY "nationality",ERROR_MSG "errormsg" FROM PASSION_USER_TEMP select count('x') from PASSION_USER_TEMP

SELECT CARD_NO "cardno",ID_VALUE "idvalue",ID_TYPE "idtype",ACTION_FLAG "actionflag",VALID_CARD "validcard",ALREADY_REGISTERED "alreadyregistered",REGISTRATION_COMPLETED "registrationcompleted",INPUT_FILE_NAME "inputfilename",RETURN_FILE_CREATED "returnfilecreated",ERROR_CODE "errorcode",FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG "fileprocessedflag",NATIONALITY "nationality",ERROR_MSG "errormsg" FROM PASSION_USER_TEMP select count('x') from PASSION_USER_TEMP
crud.sqlinsert: insert into PASSION_USER_TEMP( CARD_NO, ID_VALUE, ID_TYPE, ACTION_FLAG, VALID_CARD, ALREADY_REGISTERED, REGISTRATION_COMPLETED, INPUT_FILE_NAME, RETURN_FILE_CREATED, ERROR_CODE, FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG, NATIONALITY, ERROR_MSG) values ( #inp.form1[0].CARD_NO, #inp.form1[0].ID_VALUE, #inp.form1[0].ID_TYPE, #inp.form1[0].ACTION_FLAG, #inp.form1[0].VALID_CARD, #inp.form1[0].ALREADY_REGISTERED, #inp.form1[0].REGISTRATION_COMPLETED, #inp.form1[0].INPUT_FILE_NAME, #inp.form1[0].RETURN_FILE_CREATED, #inp.form1[0].ERROR_CODE, #inp.form1[0].FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG, #inp.form1[0].NATIONALITY, #inp.form1[0].ERROR_MSG )

insert into PASSION_USER_TEMP( CARD_NO, ID_VALUE, ID_TYPE, ACTION_FLAG, VALID_CARD, ALREADY_REGISTERED, REGISTRATION_COMPLETED, INPUT_FILE_NAME, RETURN_FILE_CREATED, ERROR_CODE, FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG, NATIONALITY, ERROR_MSG) values ( #inp.form1[0].CARD_NO, #inp.form1[0].ID_VALUE, #inp.form1[0].ID_TYPE, #inp.form1[0].ACTION_FLAG, #inp.form1[0].VALID_CARD, #inp.form1[0].ALREADY_REGISTERED, #inp.form1[0].REGISTRATION_COMPLETED, #inp.form1[0].INPUT_FILE_NAME, #inp.form1[0].RETURN_FILE_CREATED, #inp.form1[0].ERROR_CODE, #inp.form1[0].FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG, #inp.form1[0].NATIONALITY, #inp.form1[0].ERROR_MSG )
crud.sqlupdate: update PASSION_USER_TEMP set ID_VALUE = #inp.form1[0].ID_VALUE, ID_TYPE = #inp.form1[0].ID_TYPE, ACTION_FLAG = #inp.form1[0].ACTION_FLAG, VALID_CARD = #inp.form1[0].VALID_CARD, ALREADY_REGISTERED = #inp.form1[0].ALREADY_REGISTERED, REGISTRATION_COMPLETED = #inp.form1[0].REGISTRATION_COMPLETED, INPUT_FILE_NAME = #inp.form1[0].INPUT_FILE_NAME, RETURN_FILE_CREATED = #inp.form1[0].RETURN_FILE_CREATED, ERROR_CODE = #inp.form1[0].ERROR_CODE, FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG = #inp.form1[0].FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG, NATIONALITY = #inp.form1[0].NATIONALITY, ERROR_MSG = #inp.form1[0].ERROR_MSG WHERE CARD_NO=#inp.form1[0].CARD_NO

update PASSION_USER_TEMP set ID_VALUE = #inp.form1[0].ID_VALUE, ID_TYPE = #inp.form1[0].ID_TYPE, ACTION_FLAG = #inp.form1[0].ACTION_FLAG, VALID_CARD = #inp.form1[0].VALID_CARD, ALREADY_REGISTERED = #inp.form1[0].ALREADY_REGISTERED, REGISTRATION_COMPLETED = #inp.form1[0].REGISTRATION_COMPLETED, INPUT_FILE_NAME = #inp.form1[0].INPUT_FILE_NAME, RETURN_FILE_CREATED = #inp.form1[0].RETURN_FILE_CREATED, ERROR_CODE = #inp.form1[0].ERROR_CODE, FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG = #inp.form1[0].FILE_PROCESSED_FLAG, NATIONALITY = #inp.form1[0].NATIONALITY, ERROR_MSG = #inp.form1[0].ERROR_MSG WHERE CARD_NO=#inp.form1[0].id|STRING
